name: Tamagotchi Mastermind
description:
It is a tamagotchi, but you control your food. Use WASD to move around as the eye + Space to possess creatures of appropriate level.

Devlog will be available soon on my YouTube channel about indie game development: https://youtube.com/c/Khud0

Music was made by: https://www.instagram.com/natasteewsym/ ( https://soundcloud.com/andreywww/tracks )
